sources.description: The Hands of Orlac (German: Orlacs HÃ¤nde ) is a 1924 Austrian silent film directed by Robert Wiene and starring Conrad Veidt , Alexandra Sorina and Fritz Kortner . It is based on the novel Les Mains d'Orlac by Maurice Renard .
